title: Peter Thiel Hires Vance at Mithril Capital
summary: Peter Thiel brings J.D. Vance into his global investment firm Mithril Capital as an investor, marking a significant moment in Vance's early professional career. This relationship positioned Vance within Thiel's influential tech and venture capital network, setting the stage for Vance's future political trajectory.
